name: DelmarvaPowerSmartHomePilot
0:
”Alexa, turn on Office Light.”
”Alexa, increase Thermostat temperature.”
”Alexa, dim my Family Room.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Delmarva Power Smart Home Pilot skill allows you to monitor and control your home with the power of your voice. You can send commands that control your home’s smart plugs, lights, or even your connected thermostat.

Before you begin:

Once you’ve downloaded the Delmarva Power Smart Home app and created your Delmarva Power Smart Home account, you can enable the Delmarva Power Smart Home skill using the same credentials. Once you have linked the Delmarva Power Smart Home skill to Alexa, make sure to add devices on the Devices tab within the Alexa app to enable all compatible Delmarva Power Smart Home Pilot devices.

To get started:

You will need to have your Delmarva Power Smart Home gateway and devices installed. Learn more about the Delmarva Power Smart Home devices and get helpful installation tips at delmarva.com/smarthome.

Next steps:

After you've set up your Delmarva Power Smart Home environment you can begin monitoring and controlling all of your connected devices. Here are some examples of what you can say: - “Alexa, turn [on / off] [smart home device / group name].” - “Alexa, set [smart home device / group name] to [##]%.” - “Alexa, [brighten / dim] [smart home device / group name].” - “Alexa, set [smart home device / group name] temperature to [##] degrees.” - “Alexa, [increase / decrease] the [smart home device / group name] temperature.” Grouping Devices: This smart home skill allows you to define customized groups of devices right in the Alexa app. For more information on how to manage your groups, visit the Amazon help page: http://tinyurl.com/alexa-smart-home-groups

For more information on how this skill works, visit https://homeenergysavings.delmarva.com/smart-home-pilot-program/Amazon-Alexa.

About Delmarva Power’s Smart Home Pilot

Delmarva Power Smart Home is a pilot program created to help Delmarva Power residential customers in Maryland take greater control of their home’s energy use, increase comfort, and reduce energy costs. The Delmarva Power Smart Home Pilot is funded through the EmPOWER Maryland initiative which aims

to help Marylanders reduce energy consumption and save money. EmPOWER programs are funded by a charge on your energy bill.
